SELECT account.username, store.user_id, store.is_bonus, store.date, store.cost, skin.display_name FROM valorant_store_front AS store, valorant_weapon_skin AS skin, valorant_riot_account AS account
store.is_bonus = 0 AND store.item_id = skin.uuid AND store.user_id = account.user_id
AND store.date = #{date}
AND skin.display_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{displayName}, '%')

SELECT account.username, store.user_id, store.is_bonus, store.date, store.cost, store.discount_percent, store.discount_cost, skin.display_name FROM valorant_store_front AS store, valorant_weapon_skin AS skin, valorant_riot_account AS account
store.is_bonus = 1 AND store.item_id = skin.uuid AND store.user_id = account.user_id
AND store.date >= #{date}
AND skin.display_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{displayName}, '%')
ORDER BY account.username ASC LIMIT 1000

SELECT account.username, store.user_id, store.is_bonus, store.date, JSON_ARRAYAGG(store.cost) AS cost_list, JSON_ARRAYAGG(store.discount_percent) AS discount_percent_list, JSON_ARRAYAGG(store.discount_cost) AS discount_cost_list, JSON_ARRAYAGG(skin.display_name) AS display_name_list FROM valorant_store_front AS store, valorant_weapon_skin AS skin, valorant_riot_account AS account WHERE store.item_id = skin.uuid AND store.user_id = account.user_id AND store.date >= #{date} AND store.user_id IN (SELECT single.user_id FROM ( (SELECT store.user_id, GROUP_CONCAT(skin.display_name) AS display_name_list FROM valorant_store_front AS store, valorant_weapon_skin AS skin WHERE store.item_id = skin.uuid AND store.date = #{date} AND store.is_bonus = 0 GROUP BY store.user_id, store.is_bonus, store.date HAVING 1
AND display_name_list LIKE CONCAT('%', #{skin1}, '%')
AND display_name_list LIKE CONCAT('%', #{skin2}, '%')
AND display_name_list LIKE CONCAT('%', #{skin3}, '%')
AND display_name_list LIKE CONCAT('%', #{skin4}, '%')
) AS single INNER JOIN (SELECT store.user_id, GROUP_CONCAT(skin.display_name) AS display_name_list FROM valorant_store_front AS store, valorant_weapon_skin AS skin WHERE store.item_id = skin.uuid AND store.date >= #{date} AND store.is_bonus = 1 GROUP BY store.user_id, store.is_bonus, store.date HAVING 1
AND display_name_list LIKE CONCAT('%', #{bonusSkin1}, '%')
AND display_name_list LIKE CONCAT('%', #{bonusSkin2}, '%')
AND display_name_list LIKE CONCAT('%', #{bonusSkin3}, '%')
) AS bonus ON single.user_id = bonus.user_id)) GROUP BY store.user_id, store.is_bonus, store.date ORDER BY user_id ASC, is_bonus ASC

SELECT account.username, store.user_id, store.is_bonus, store.date, JSON_ARRAYAGG(store.cost) AS cost_list, JSON_ARRAYAGG(store.discount_percent) AS discount_percent_list, JSON_ARRAYAGG(store.discount_cost) AS discount_cost_list, JSON_ARRAYAGG(skin.display_name) AS display_name_list FROM valorant_store_front AS store, valorant_weapon_skin AS skin, valorant_riot_account AS account WHERE store.item_id = skin.uuid AND store.user_id = account.user_id AND store.date = #{date} AND store.user_id IN (SELECT store.user_id FROM valorant_store_front AS store, valorant_weapon_skin AS skin WHERE store.item_id = skin.uuid AND store.date = #{date} AND store.is_bonus = 0 GROUP BY store.user_id, store.is_bonus, store.date HAVING 1
AND GROUP_CONCAT(skin.display_name) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{skin1}, '%')
AND GROUP_CONCAT(skin.display_name) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{skin2}, '%')
AND GROUP_CONCAT(skin.display_name) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{skin3}, '%')
AND GROUP_CONCAT(skin.display_name) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{skin4}, '%')
) GROUP BY store.user_id, store.is_bonus, store.date ORDER BY user_id ASC, is_bonus ASC
